Resume Building Workshop

Session 1

Resume
October 15, 2024
Duration: 2 hours
Attendees: 45 students

Event Summary

Comprehensive workshop on resume building for internship applications. Covered ATS optimization, formatting best practices, and content organization.

Key Takeaways

  • ‚Ä¢ Use action verbs and quantifiable achievements
  • ‚Ä¢ Keep resume to 1 page for internships
  • ‚Ä¢ Tailor resume for each application
  • ‚Ä¢ Include relevant projects and skills

SOPHIE 101 Workshop

Statement of Purpose

SOPHIE
November 5, 2024
Duration: 3 hours
Attendees: 32 students

Event Summary

In-depth workshop on writing effective Statements of Purpose for higher studies applications. Covered structure, content, and common mistakes.

Key Takeaways

  • ‚Ä¢ Start with a compelling hook
  • ‚Ä¢ Show research alignment
  • ‚Ä¢ Include specific examples
  • ‚Ä¢ Keep it concise and focused

Dual Degree Session

Information & Guidance

Dual Degree
September 20, 2024
Duration: 2.5 hours
Attendees: 28 students

Event Summary

Comprehensive session on dual degree programs at IIT Bombay. Covered application process, requirements, and career implications.

Key Takeaways

  • ‚Ä¢ Apply in 2nd year
  • ‚Ä¢ Minimum CPI requirement varies
  • ‚Ä¢ Additional 1-2 years of study
  • ‚Ä¢ Enhanced career opportunities
